:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
Review timelines of workflows running or previously run:

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### On models

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^[[Working with the model inventory](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models)]

3. On the landing page of your model, locate the Workflows section that shows a timeline of workflows associated with that model.

    Use the buttons or keyboard shortcuts[^timeline-shortcuts] to control the timeline:

    - **{{< fa magnifying-glass-plus >}}** — Zoom in
    - **{{< fa magnifying-glass-minus >}}** — Zoom out
    - **{{< fa arrow-left >}}** — Move earlier to the left
    - **{{< fa calendar-days >}} Go to Today** — Focus on today
    - **{{< fa arrow-right >}}** — Move later to the right

If workflows are running or have previously run on your model, you can:

- Click on any listed workflow to review the details of that specific workflow.

- Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific types of workflows.^[Workflow timelines on models include child workflows, such as workflows attached to findings. Filter for **Model Workflows Only** or **Finding Workflows Only**.]

- Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of all workflows by status:
    - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
    - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
    - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.^[[Conditional requirements](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#conditional-requirements)]
    - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.^[[Workflow step types](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#workflow-step-types)]
    - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.^[[Abort workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#abort-workflows)]
    - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.^[[Initiate workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#initiate-workflows)]

#### On findings

On the details page of your finding,^[[View and filter model findings](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-model-findings.qmd#view-model-findings)] locate the Workflows section that shows a timeline of workflows associated with that finding.

Use the buttons or keyboard shortcuts[^timeline-shortcuts] to control the timeline:

- **{{< fa magnifying-glass-plus >}}** — Zoom in
- **{{< fa magnifying-glass-minus >}}** — Zoom out
- **{{< fa arrow-left >}}** — Move earlier to the left
- **{{< fa calendar-days >}} Go to Today** — Focus on today
- **{{< fa arrow-right >}}** — Move later to the right

If workflows are running or have previously run on your finding, you can:

- Click on any listed workflow to review the details of that specific workflow.

- Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific workflows.

- Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of all workflows by status:
    - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
    - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
    - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.^[[Conditional requirements](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#conditional-requirements)]
    - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.^[[Workflow step types](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#workflow-step-types)]
    - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.^[[Abort workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#abort-workflows)]
    - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.^[[Initiate workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#initiate-workflows)]

:::

[^timeline-shortcuts]:

    ::: {.callout title="Timeline control shortcuts"}

    - **Move timeline left or right** — <br>
        - Click and drag
        - OR <kbd>Shift</kbd> + scroll wheel
    - **Slow zoom in or out** — <br><kbd>Alt</kbd> + scroll wheel
    - **Quick zoom in or out** — <br><kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + scroll wheel
    :::

:::: {.content-hidden unless-format="revealjs"}
Review timelines of workflows running or previously run:

#### On models

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model [by applying a filter or searching for it](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models){target="_blank"}.

3. On the landing page of your model, locate the Workflows section that shows a timeline of workflows associated with that model.

    If workflows are running or have previously run on your model, you can:

    - Click on any listed workflow to review the details of that specific workflow.

    - Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from model workflows only, or child finding workflows only.

    - Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of workflows by status:
        - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
        - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
        - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.
        - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.
        - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.
        - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.

#### On findings

On the [details page of your finding](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-model-findings.qmd#view-model-findings){target="_blank"}, locate the Workflows section that shows a timeline of workflows associated with that finding.

If workflows are running or have previously run on your finding, you can:

    - Click on any listed workflow to review the details of that specific workflow.

    - Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific workflows.

    - Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of workflows by status:
        - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
        - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
        - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.
        - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.
        - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.
        - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.
